title: League Music(Spotify for League)
body:
Would be amazing if there were music buttons in main menu and in-game instead of tabbing out. Maybe even community music, and it would be just for league. 

Music: LCS, Logins, League Inspired music, official League music, and maybe more added without it having any copyright issues.

U  guys could help me expand on this idea.

replies.body: Another case of, pls go to 'player creations'... is it that hard to understand...
I would just like it if they added all there songs on Spotify. A lot are not on there. {{item:3151}} {{champion:37}}
